MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:33pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation.And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20 PM on Friday, 19 March 2021.
